files.patch:
@@ -1,2 +1,2 @@
-jextract --source -t opengl -lGL -l/System/Library/Frameworks/GLUT.framework/Versions/Current/GLUT \
-  -I /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/include/ \
+jextract -t opengl -l :/System/Library/Frameworks/GLUT.framework/Versions/Current/GLUT \
+  -l :/System/Library/Frameworks/OpenGL.framework/Versions/Current/OpenGL \
@@ -5,1 +5,1 @@
-javac --enable-preview --source=22 opengl/*.java
+javac --source=22 -d . opengl/*.java
\ No newline at end of file
